definition: to file for investigation/to prosecute (a case)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: Procuratorates also supervised the public security organs in investigation of 5 IPR infringement crimes.
sentences.chinese: 監督公安機關立案偵查侵犯知識產權犯罪案件5件。

sentences.english: This case should be put on file for investigation and prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 檢察院已經立案偵查此事。
